original_text: I want you to be completely happy, in the same way that I myself am happy. That is why I have told you these things.
korean_text: 내가 이것을 너희에게 이름은 내 기쁨이 너희 안에 있어 너희 기쁨을 충만하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: I want you to be completely happy
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 완전히 기쁘게 하고 싶다

sentences.original_text: in the same way that I myself am happy
sentences.korean_translation: 나 자신이 기쁜 것과 같은 방식으로

sentences.original_text: I have told you these things
